column1: Service Domain specification for Consumer Loan

column2: The consumer loan product may include different properties/features depending on a bank's preferences and policies. The loan is targeted at consumer customer and may be associated with a type of product and may or may not be secured by collateral.
A consumer customer applies for and gets a loan to purchase new furniture..
This service domain handles the fulfillment of a consumer loan product. This includes the initial set-up of the loan facility and the completion of scheduled and ad-hoc product processing tasks
Set-up a consumer loan facility. Handle deposits and withdrawals. Provide statements and assessment reports on the loan. Support loan restructuring
